data.name: Pronty Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Pronty - Original Soundtracks

Listen to the call from the deep sea and take a long and timeless adventure.
Created by the composer Su Yubo, he creates an exclusive and charming soundtrack for every battle and every scene.
Lead the guardians to taste the purest original voice.

This OST includes 24 pieces of music.
